steps.title: Use “feliz cumpleaños por anticipado” to say “happy early birthday.”
steps.content: Use “feliz cumpleaños por anticipado” to say “happy early birthday.” If you want to wish someone a happy early birthday in Spanish, “feliz cumpleaños por anticipado” is the simplest way to get your message across. It’s the direct translation for “happy early birthday,” making it appropriate for any situation and recipient. steps.title: Share a famous birthday quote when you’re at a loss for words.
steps.content: Share a famous birthday quote when you’re at a loss for words. If you’re struggling to find the right sentiments, get help from someone else! Choose an author, celebrity, or public figure that the birthday boy/girl admires, then use their words to wish them a happy birthday in advance. Whether you opt for something funny, sweet, or inspirational, it’s sure to make them feel cared for . “Youth has no age.” —Pablo Picasso “You don't get older, you get better." —Shirley Bassey “We turn not older with years, but newer every day.” —Emily Dickinson “Don’t just count your years, make your years count.” —George Meredith “The older you get the better you get, unless you are a banana.” —Betty White “You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” —Les Brown “Whatever with the past has gone, the best is always yet to come.” —Lucy Larcom “As soon as I saw you I knew a grand adventure was about to happen.” —A.A. Milne “Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.” —John Lennon “We grow neither better nor worse as we get old, but more like ourselves.” —Bernard Baruch "The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age." ―Lucille Ball “Today is the oldest you have been and the youngest you will ever be again. Make the most of it!” —Nicky Gumbel “Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.” —Decimus Magnus Ausonius

steps.title: Personalize your message and express excitement for their big day.
steps.content: Personalize your message and express excitement for their big day. Reflect on all the wonderful memories you’ve shared with the other person, and list specific traits you love about them to make them feel cherished. Keep your tone fun, playful, and positive to spread good vibes, and mention how excited you are for their birthday. If you’re having trouble coming up with ideas, look up positive adjectives online and weave them into your wish. Additionally, share your hopes and wishes for their upcoming year to write a more meaningful message.

steps.title: Sending an early birthday wish shows you care about the other person.
steps.content: Sending an early birthday wish shows you care about the other person. If you can’t be there to celebrate on the actual day, an advance wish lets the other person know that you’re thinking of them and hoping they have the best birthday ever. Here are some other benefits of sending an early wish to a friend, family member, or colleague: Builds anticipation: Early wishes can increase excitement for the actual birthday, and make the celebrations feel more special. Great for busy schedules: An advance birthday message is a good idea if you can’t be there in person but still want to share your well wishes. Strengthens relationships: Sending an early birthday wish shows that you’re making an effort in your relationship and that you care about the other person’s well-being. Creates a positive workplace: In general, acknowledging a colleague’s birthday is a small gesture that can make them feel seen and heard, and make them more motivated at work.
